channel.title: Artistizen's Tributjects
channel.description:
# Artistizen
![image|690x388](upload://8KhJbJ35SdPZlrxdLPDBfLJzAsi.jpeg)
>**25 Radix Team Tributjects** in **100 sets** to celebrate the launch of Scrypto! Collecting at least **1 NFT** entitles you to **recieve ART tokens** and **dividend payments** from the **Artistizen NFT Marketplace** opening in Q2 2022. **Difference between **collectors** and **traders** NFT:** >There is no price difference, but as a trader you only keep the place in line, without actually knowing what card you could get. It's basically like going to buy a limited pack of pokemon cards but keeping the pack sealed and selling it back later for profit or a trade. You could've had a Dan, but you will never know ;) So a trader just pays 111 XRD for the reservation in line. As a collector, you will need to pay the rest of the amount to open your pack. **Price of each NFT**: Price started at 1 XRD and increases by 1 XRD with each reservation placed. Current price can be seen [here.](https://www.artistizen.com/) **Links:** * [Website](https://artistizen.com/) * [ART token thread](https://radixtalk.com/t/art-token/270) * [ART Tokenomics](https://www.artistizen.com/tokenomics.html) **Social:** * [Telegram group](https://t.me/tributjects) * [@Artistizen](https://t.me/Artistizen)

item.title: Artistizen's Tributjects
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Artistizen

25 Radix Team Tributjects in 100 sets to celebrate the launch of Scrypto!
Collecting at least 1 NFT entitles you to recieve ART tokens and dividend payments from the Artistizen NFT Marketplace opening in Q2 2022.

Difference between collectors and traders NFT:

There is no price difference, but as a trader you only keep the place in line, without actually knowing what card you could get.
It’s basically like going to buy a limited pack of pokemon cards but keeping the pack sealed and selling it back later for profit or a trade. You could’ve had a Dan, but you will never know
So a trader just pays 111 XRD for the reservation in line.
As a collector, you will need to pay the rest of the amount to open your pack.

Price of each NFT: Price started at 1 XRD and increases by 1 XRD with each reservation placed.
Current price can be seen here.

Links:

  • Website
  • ART token thread
  • ART Tokenomics

Social:

  • Telegram group
  • @Artistizen

Read full topic
